snippet: The leaders of the Islamic State have created their own currency, part of a grandiose plan to restore the caliphate era that dominated the Middle East more than 1,300 years ago.
abstract: Islamic State has created its own currency, part of a plan to restore caliphate era that dominated Middle East more than 1,300 years ago; says it will begin minting gold, silver and copper coins that will be legal tender of lands controlled by group know as ISIS or ISIL.
lead_paragraph: The leaders of the Islamic State have created their own currency, part of a grandiose plan to restore the caliphate era that dominated the Middle East more than 1,300 years ago.

headline.main: Islamic State Says It Plans to Issue Its Own Currency
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Says It Plans to Issue Its Own Currency

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
